jcr:content.jcr:title: MTV Video Music Award for Best Alternative Video

contentheadline.headline: MTV Video Music Award for Best Alternative Video

contentrichtext.text: The MTV Video Music Award for Best Alternative Video (also known as '''Best Alternative Music Video''') was first given out in 1992 during MTV's Video Music Awards show. Prior to the award being called Best Alternative Video, this award was known as [[MTV Video Music Award for Best Post-Modern Video]]<ref>MTV Video Music Award for Best Post-Modern</ref> in 1989 and 1990. The last of this award was given out in 1998 to [[Green Day]] for their song [[Good Riddance (Time of Your Life)]]. The award stopped being awarded after some artists and videos within this nomination genre became eligible for [[MTV Video Music Award for Best Rock Video]]. [[Nirvana (band)|Nirvana]] is undoubtedly the biggest winner of this award, winning three times in a row from 1992 to 1994. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! Year !! Winner !! Other nominee |- |{{mtvvma|1991}} |[[Jane's Addiction]] — "[[Been Caught Stealing]]" |<small> * [[Jesus Jones]] — "[[Right Here, Right Now (Jesus Jones song)|Right Here, Right Now]]" * [[R.E.M.]] — "[[Losing My Religion]]" * [[The Replacements (band)|The Replacements]] — "When It Began"</small> |- |{{mtvvma|1992}} |[[Nirvana (band)|Nirvana]] — "[[Smells Like Teen Spirit]]" |<small> * [[Pearl Jam]] — "[[Alive (Pearl Jam song)|Alive]]" * [[Red Hot Chili Peppers]] — "[[Give It Away (Red Hot Chili Peppers song)|Give It Away]]" * [[The Soup Dragons]] — "Divine Thing"</small> |- |{{mtvvma|1993}} |[[Nirvana (band)|Nirvana]] — "[[In Bloom]]" |<small> * [[4 Non Blondes]] — "[[What's Up? (song)|What's Up?]]" * [[Belly (band)|Belly]] — "[[Feed the Tree]]" * [[Porno for Pyros]] — "[[Pets (song)|Pets]]" * [[Stone Temple Pilots]] — "[[Plush (song)|Plush]]"</small> |- |{{mtvvma|1994}} |[[Nirvana (band)|Nirvana]] — "[[Heart-Shaped Box]]" |<small> * [[Beck]] — "[[Loser (Beck song)|Loser]]" * [[Green Day]] — "[[Longview (song)|Longview]]" * [[The Smashing Pumpkins]] — "[[Disarm]]"</small> |- |{{mtvvma|1995}} |[[Weezer]] — "[[Buddy Holly (song)|Buddy Holly]]" |<small> * [[The Cranberries]] — "[[Zombie (song)|Zombie]]" * [[Green Day]] — "[[Basket Case (song)|Basket Case]]" * [[Hole (band)|Hole]] — "[[Doll Parts]]" * [[Stone Temple Pilots]] — "[[Interstate Love Song]]"</small> |- |{{mtvvma|1996}} |[[The Smashing Pumpkins]] — "[[1979 (song)|1979]]" |<small> * [[Bush (band)|Bush]] — "[[Glycerine (song)|Glycerine]]" * [[Everclear (band)|Everclear]] — "[[Santa Monica (song)|Santa Monica]]" * [[Foo Fighters]] — "[[Big Me]]"</small> |- |{{mtvvma|1997}} |[[Sublime (band)|Sublime]] — "[[What I Got]]" |<small> * [[Beck]] — "[[The New Pollution]]" * [[Blur (band)|Blur]] — "[[Song 2]]" * [[Foo Fighters]] — "[[Monkey Wrench (song)|Monkey Wrench]]" * [[Nine Inch Nails]] — "[[The Perfect Drug]]"</small> |- |{{mtvvma|1998}} |[[Green Day]] — "[[Good Riddance (Time of Your Life)]]" |<small> * [[Ben Folds Five]] — "[[Brick (song)|Brick]]" * [[Garbage (band)|Garbage]] — "[[Push It (Garbage song)|Push It]]" * [[Radiohead]] — "[[Karma Police]]" * [[The Verve]] — "[[Bitter Sweet Symphony]]"</small> |} == See also == * [[MTV Europe Music Award for Best Alternative]] * [[MTV Video Music Award for Best Post-Modern Video]] {{MTV Video Music Awards}} *[[Jane's Addiction]] ==References== <references/> {{Refimprove|date=February 2013}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mtv Video Music Award For Best Alternative Video}} [[Category:MTV Video Music Awards]] {{Music-video-stub}}
